titleStmt.title: To BENJAMIN WEBSTER,Benjamin Nottingham Webster (1797-1882; Dictionary of National Biography), actor, dramatist, and lessee of the Adelphi Theatre. 28 DECEMBER 1864
titleStmt.bibl: Charles Dickens Letters Project, ed. Leon Litvack, Katie Brandt, Emily Bell, and Jeremy Parrott (London: Dickens Fellowship), DickensLetters.com.
